entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
